your tsconfig.json is not in the app. Accoring to http://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/tsconfig-json.html

Using tsconfig.json

By invoking tsc with no input files, in which case the compiler searches for the tsconfig.json file starting in the current directory

and continuing up the parent directory chain. By invoking tsc with no input files and a --project (or just -p) command line option that specifies the path of a directory containing a tsconfig.json file, or a path to a valid .json file containing the configurations.
